scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises receipts for goods purchased by John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky; bills on Hunt for goods and legal services; bills for goods for the Eastern Kentucky Lunatic Asylum for which Hunt was a board member; orders for Hunt's merchandise; a shipping list for paper; Hunt's account statement with Riddle, Forsyth, and Co.; checks; an indenture of a land sale to Hunt from Thomas January's estate; and a legal agreement in which Charles M. King assumed debt owed John W. Hunt.
